meanings.definition: A Japanese dish of seafood or vegetables that have been battered and deep-fried.
meanings.sent1: I ordered crispy tempura shrimp for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant serves delicious tempura with dipping sauce.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally dropped the tempura in the fryer, creating a seafood explosion!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sizzle of tempura in hot oil.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked tempura filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: The batter used to coat food before frying.
meanings.sent1: The tempura coating on the chicken was light and crispy.
meanings.sent2: She mixed the tempura batter to the perfect consistency.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to lick the tempura batter off the counter.
meanings.sent4: His words clung to her like thick tempura batter.
meanings.sent5: The golden tempura batter bubbled as it fried in the pan.
